short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss a deal from your communities. Get notified every time you visit a site with a partner offer from your communities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Honey for communities!" 
Stop missing out on all the perks from your communities - Use our Chrome Extension and get notified every time you visit a site with a partner deal. 

All you need to do is:
1. Add the Chrome Extension
2. Create an account at Perks.so
3. Add your community to your profile

You will now get notified every time you visit a site with a partner offer with one of your communities.  

We do not store any data from you when you use the chrome extension. The only data we collect from you is your name and email that you need to create an account at perks.so.
